Entries.6398445/t 900 1800/d Sat Sun: none/-100 -100/Claire 4 6 2 Juliet -100 -100 0 farmer -100 -100 0/skippable/viewport 9 7/showFrame Claire 34/pause 500/playSound doorOpen/warp Juliet 2 11/move Juliet 0 -3 0/emote Claire 16/move Claire -1 0 2/pause 500/speak Claire "Oh, hello. You must be the new girl.#$b#Juliet, right?"/move Juliet 0 -2 1/faceDirection Claire 3/speak Juliet "You've done your homework. I'm impressed.$1#$b#Hmm, Morris really does like redheads, doesn't he? Of course, mine ain't natural.$3"/pause 500/emote Claire 40/pause 1500/speak Claire "Err, anyway, I'm Claire.#$b#Um, would you like me to show you around?"/pause 500/speak Juliet "Yeh sure, why not.#$b#Hey, you seem sweet. What are you in for?"/pause 500/emote Claire 8/speak Claire "I... I don't know what you're talking about."/pause 500/faceDirection Juliet 3/pause 500/faceDirection Juliet 1/speak Juliet "To be dragged into this ... this purgatory.$2#$b#Oh... Oh crap. You're here by choice?$4"/pause 500/speak Claire "Well, yes. I suppose so. Aren't you?"/pause 500/emote Juliet 60/pause 1500/speak Juliet "Err..#$b#Yeah, yeah of course I am. Loving that Joja cola. Join Us Thrive. Yeah."/pause 500/emote Juliet 28/pause 2000/emote Claire 40/pause 2000/playSound doorOpen/warp farmer 2 10/jump Juliet 4/jump Claire 4/faceDirection Juliet 2 true/faceDirection Claire 2 true/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -1 0/speak Juliet "Hey, you're the farmer right, I heard you'd escaped the Joja clutches! So what brought you here?"/quickQuestion #The fresh country air.#I wanted to follow my grandfather's legacy.#A bus, duh.#None of your business.(break)speak Juliet "Hah, yeh, that's all the rage these days, isn't it?"(break)speak Juliet "Noble choice! I'll stop sticking my nose in where it doesn't belong."/pause 500/speak Claire "Sorry . You shouldn't really be in here.#$b#This is for staff only.$2"/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Juliet "Anyhow, good to meet you, . See you around sometime."/faceDirection Juliet 1/speak Juliet "I 'spose I'd better get the grand tour now."/emote Claire 32/faceDirection Claire 3/speak Claire "Sure Juliet... the lockers are over here..."/pause 500/end dialogue Juliet "Poor Claire... that Morris guy really didn't like you coming in there.$2#$b#You'd think he had the crowned jewels or the holy grail hidden somewhere."
